title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagine work with Amazon Quick Suite (BIZ202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 用 Amazon Quick Suite 重新构想工作方式 (BIZ202)
abstract: Amazon Quick Suite is an agentic teammate for business users that quickly answers their questions at work and turns those insights into actions. Join this session to hear compelling customer stories and discover how organizations are transforming workplace productivity with AI agents for automation, research, and business intelligence in a unified experience. Learn more about how Quick Suite eliminates application and context switching, breaks down data silos, delivers comprehensive insights, and accelerates decision making and taking action - all the while maintaining enterprise-grade security.
abstract_cn: Amazon QuickSight 是一个面向业务用户的智能助手，能够快速解答工作中的问题并将这些洞察转化为行动。参加本次会议，聆听引人注目的客户案例，了解各组织如何通过统一体验中的自动化、研究和商业智能 AI 代理来转变工作场所生产力。深入了解 QuickSight 如何消除应用程序和上下文切换，打破数据孤岛，提供全面洞察，加速决策制定和行动执行——同时保持企业级安全性。

presenter.name: Michael Armentano
presenter.title: Pr. WW GTM Spec, Agentic AI, APJ-C
